answers.answer: Buckwheat would be fine in your diet. It is a fiber, with a nutty taste, that is high in vitamin B1, B2, E, potassium, magnesium, iron, and protein. It helps lower cholesterol and blood pressure. There are studies showing it is helping maintain blood glucose. Moderation and variety is the best approach and not to go overboard.

question: Hi I want to know about Buckwheat farinetta. I was suffering with diabetes. Now I am not. I want to know If i add Buckwheat farinetta in my daily food, does it cause any trouble. My 23 month son is still on nursing.
title: Buckwheat farinetta
